Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Permission System: Add Additional Adult Dashboard with granular access control

Add comprehensive permission-based dashboard for additional adults (dads, grandparents, babysitters, tutors) with professional interface and theme compatibility.

Key Features:
- Additional Adult Dashboard with 16 granular permissions (view/edit tasks, calendar, family data, reports, etc.)
- PermissionGate component for permission-based rendering with fallback UI
- PermissionIndicator showing current access level (Extensive/Moderate/Limited/None)
- usePermissions hook with PermissionEngine for centralized permission logic
- CSS variables ONLY - no hard-coded colors, works with all 26+ themes
- Lucide icons throughout (NO emojis for professional appearance)
- Permission request system for users to request additional access

Technical Implementation:
- Permission types and interfaces (src/types/permissions.ts)
- PermissionEngine class for permission checking logic (src/lib/permissions.ts)
- usePermissions hook with Supabase integration (src/hooks/usePermissions.ts)
- Permission-gated widgets for tasks, calendar, family overview, reports
- Visual permission indicators with category grouping

Additional Changes:
- Fix FamilyMemberLogin routing from old teen/child dashboard routes to new member route
- Add Family Mode Dashboard components (widgets for family overview, tasks, rewards, analytics)
- Update FamilyDashboard to use new Family Mode architecture
